response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its unique value proposition and market positioning, this product is worth more than $1,000,000 to us. Considering its immense potential to benefit you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000.

This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible value while also allowing us to maximize the return on our investment. We understand the importance of a fair deal and aim to foster a long-term partnership based on mutual growth and success.

Please let us know if you require any additional information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. We are confident that once you experience the benefits of our product, you will see its true worth exceeds even the offered price.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
